attributes.action: order recommencement of England v Scotland football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a sign that the Union is as strong as ever, and amity and goodwilll reign, the England v Scotland football match and associated events should be recommenced. English fans will be happy to embrace their Scots cousins as will Scots to do likewise to the old enemy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
